data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Satu Mare, Romania. Please, stir the 20,964 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Satu Mare, Romania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 331,200 souls in Satu Mare and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary: On average, 42 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Satu Mare, Romania.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, to the people of Satu Mare you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Satu Mare will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Nogai people might believe through him.
Father, help your children in Satu Mare, Romania find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Satu Mare.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Satu Mare, Romania has a population of 331,200.

We estimate Satu Mare has 20,964 people who might know Jesus, 289,224 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,012 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 20,964 believers living in the state of Satu Mare. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.
